products.inEarDesc: Discrete and comfortable devices that fit perfectly in the ear.
products.behindEarDesc: Powerful devices with latest technology for all levels of hearing loss.

conditions.title: How can we
conditions.subtitle: Expert approach to most common hearing problems.

zzzs.title: Hearing aid
zzzs.subtitle: Take advantage of cost reimbursement through health insurance.
zzzs.step1Desc: Visit your GP who will issue a referral for an audiological examination.
zzzs.step2Desc: Book a free hearing test with us. Together we select the most suitable device.
zzzs.step3Desc: After ZZZS approval, receive your hearing aid with insurance coverage.
zzzs.ctaDesc: Call us and we'll explain the entire procedure.

pricing.title: Transparent
pricing.subtitle: Clear pricing with no hidden costs. ZZZS coverage reduces the final cost.
